title: Wheel of Fortune contestant claims he has been 'trapped in a loveless marriage'
text:
A Wheel of Fortune contestant stunned host Pat Sajak when he claimed he was 'trapped in a loveless marriage'.

Blair Davis from San Diego, California was on the popular show when he was asked about his family.

He told Sajak: 'I’ve been trapped in a loveless marriage for the last 12 years to an old battle-axe named Kim.'

Blair Davis, pictured, told Wheel of Fortune host Pat Sajak that he has been trapped in a loveless marriage for the past 12 years

Host Pat Sajak, pictured, starts laughing at the response before asking whether Davis was being facetious

The truck company owner from San Diego admitted he is madly in love with his family

This prompted uproarious laughter from the host and the studio audience, who normally expect bland pronouncements of love.

Davis continued: 'She cursed my life with three stepchildren ... and I have one rotten grandson.'

After a few moments, Sajak asked whether Davis was being 'facetious'.

The truck company owner responded: 'Absolutely. I love 'em like nobody's business.'

The hilarious clip was shared widely online where Davis was lauded for his dead-pan delivery.

However, despite winning over the host, Davis left the show empty handed.
description: Blair Davis, pictured, told Wheel of Fortune host Pat Sajak that he has been trapped in a loveless marriage for the past 12 years in a joke which had the audience in rapturous laughter.
